newsitem.title: UK: GOLF-ALFREDSSON JOINS REID AT TOP OF LEADER BOARD.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-ALFREDSSON JOINS REID AT TOP OF LEADER BOARD.

text.p: Sweden's Helen Alfredsson followed her second day course record 65 with a five-under-par 67 to share the lead at the end of the third round of the 300,000 pounds ($476,000) WPGA Championship of Europe on Saturday.
The former British Open champion, who underwent a career-threatening back operation in the winter, finished on 10-under-par 206.
She was joined in first place by Scotland's Dale Reid, who boosted hopes of a home victory when she eagled the long 18th from 10 feet in a round of 70.
They led by two shots from three Britons -- Laura Davies, Trish Johnson and Lora Fairclough.
